structure.unit: ARTICLE LII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY ADVISORY COMMITTEE ON GROUND TRANSPORTATION REGULATION

text.section:
Sec. 2-581. Creation and purposes.
There is hereby created and established the Miami-Dade County Advisory Committee on Ground Transportation Regulation. The committee is created for the specific purpose of reviewing such written recommendations and accompanying ordinance amendments of the county manager related to ground transportation regulation as provided in Resolution No. R.127-91.
